mapper.insert: insert into other_contract (o_id, contract_code, contract_name, contract_name_jia, contract_name_yi, contract_money, abutment_department, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, contract_probably_text, abutment_signed_time,history,zanding_money ) values (#{other.oId}, #{other.contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other.contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other.contractNameJia,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other.contractNameYi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other.contractMoney}, #{other.abutmentDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other.contractStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other.contractEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other.contractProbablyText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other.abutmentSignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,#{other.zandingMoney} )
mapper.update: update other_contract set contract_name = #{other.contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_name_jia = #{other.contractNameJia,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_name_yi = #{other.contractNameYi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_money = #{other.contractMoney}, abutment_department = #{other.abutmentDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_start_time = #{other.contractStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_end_time = #{other.contractEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_probably_text = #{other.contractProbablyText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abutment_signed_time = #{other.abutmentSignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zanding_money=#{other.zandingMoney} where o_id = #{other.oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.*,c.cc_name,d.om_name from other_contract as a left join mode_status as b on a.o_id=b.mode_id left join consociation_company as c on a.contract_name_yi=c.cc_id left join organization_management as d on a.abutment_department=d.om_id where b.status=#{status} and a.history=1

select a.*,c.cc_name,d.om_name from other_contract as a left join mode_status as b on a.o_id=b.mode_id left join consociation_company as c on a.contract_name_yi=c.cc_id left join organization_management as d on a.abutment_department=d.om_id where a.contract_code=#{no} and a.history=0
SELECT COUNT(1) from (SELECT DISTINCT contract_code FROM other_contract where contract_code like #{year}) as a

select a.*,b.om_name,c.cc_name from other_contract as a LEFT JOIN organization_management as b on a.abutment_department=b.om_id LEFT JOIN consociation_company as c on a.contract_name_yi=c.cc_id where o_id=#{id}

select *,c.cc_name,d.om_name from other_contract as a left join consociation_company as c on a.contract_name_yi=c.cc_id left join organization_management as d on a.abutment_department=d.om_id where a.contract_code=#{no} and a.history=1
SELECT contract_money FROM other_contract as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.o_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2 and abutment_signed_time like #{time}
mapper.update: UPDATE other_contract SET history=0 where contract_code =(select a.contract_code from (SELECT contract_code from other_contract WHERE o_id=#{id}) AS a)
UPDATE other_contract SET history=1 WHERE o_id=#{id}
